Title: Establishes a novel virus essential workers scholarship program
Summary: Establishes a novel virus essential workers scholarship program to award annual scholarships to essential employees who worked during the outbreak of novel coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) or during the outbreak of another novel virus and children of essential employees who have died as a result of contracting COVID-19 or another novel virus.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing a novel virus essential workers scholarship program
